## Score markers
```{r}
sce$label <- as.factor(sce$label)
markers <- scoreMarkers(sce, sce$label, lfc = 0.25, BPPARAM = bp)
```

```{r}
# Clean markers list
transform_marker <- function(marker_df, cluster_name) {
  marker_df <- as.data.frame(marker_df) %>%
    select(median.logFC.cohen, mean.logFC.cohen) %>%
    arrange(desc(median.logFC.cohen)) %>%
    filter(median.logFC.cohen > 0.25) %>%
    mutate(gene = rownames(.), cluster = as.numeric(cluster_name))
  rownames(marker_df) <- NULL
  return(marker_df)
}

# Apply the function to each element of the markers list along with their names
markers <- mapply(transform_marker, markers, names(markers), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
```

```{r}
top_markers <- bind_rows(markers) %>%
  arrange(cluster,desc(mean.logFC.cohen), .by_group = TRUE) %>%
  group_by(cluster) %>%
  slice_head(n = 5)
```


```{r}
feats <- c("CD3E","CD3D","CD4","CD8A","CD8B","FCGR3A","NCAM1","NGK7")
```

```{r}
create_plots(sce, "label", intersect(top_markers$gene, rownames(sce)), pal)
```

```{r}
create_plots(sce, "label", intersect(feats, rownames(sce)), pal)
```

# Annotation
```{r}
sce$lvl2[sce$label %in% c(1,10,11,12,2,3,4)] <- "CD4"
sce$lvl2[sce$label %in% c(6,7,8)] <- "CD8"
sce$lvl2[sce$label == 5] <- "NK"
sce$lvl2[sce$label == 9] <- "LowQ"
```

```{r}
sce$lvl2 <- factor(sce$lvl2, levels = c("CD4","CD8","NK", "LowQ"))
```

```{r}
create_plots(sce, "lvl2", intersect(feats, rownames(sce)), pal_lvl2_t)
```

```{r}
df <- as.data.frame(colData(sce))
qc_metrics <- wrap_plots(
    plot_density(df, "sum", "lvl2", pal_lvl2_t, "Counts",200),
    plot_density(df, "detected", "lvl2", pal_lvl2_t, "Features",150),
    plot_density(df, "cell_area", "lvl2", pal_lvl2_t, "Cell Area",500),
    plot_density(df, "nucleus_area", "lvl2", pal_lvl2_t, "Nucleus Area",500),
    ncol = 2, nrow = 2) +
plot_annotation(tag_levels = "A")
```
